casebody.data:
NEXT ADVISOR CONTINUED, INC.
v.
LENDINGTREE, INC. and Lendingtree, LLC No. 391A16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2016 Russell F. Sizemore, Attorney at Law, Jonathan M. Watkins, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mary Cabell Clay, Attorney at Law, Glenn E. Ketner, III, Attorney at Law, Scott M. Tyler, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Lendingtree, Inc., et al. Christopher G. Smith, Attorney at Law, Susan H. Hargrove, Attorney at Law, Isaac A. Linnartz, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Next Advisor Continued, Inc.

ORDER

Appeal dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in Conference, this the 8th day of December 2016.
